lines.text: You're something else, woman, and that's no lie.
The only place there's no lies between a man and a woman is in bed.
Get yourself ready for some truth.
A little truth does go a long way.
They kid me about being the prude of the airlines. But, with my shape and measurements, I don't dare wear my uniform form-fitting. I did once, and even the automatic pilot made a pass at me.
Last one in bed gets no head!
I never was a superpatriot, but there comes a time when you have to lie down and be counted.
To get into show business, honey, you have to show your business!

[very stoned]
Get thee beneath me, subconscious!
A few sticks of dynamite grass, a gallon of wine, and a chick like you.
[laughs]
What more could a man in a clothes closet full of clothes ask for, huh?
Isn't this illegal search and seizure, and illegal entry without a warrant?
You watch too much television.
Hey man, like, why don't we just knock off the motorcycle movie talk and, uh, gangbang her?
It's sickies like you that give Hollywood a bad name!
You old pervert! What would your mother say?
My ma? Let's ask her.
[calling upstairs]
Hey ma, we got another one!

[Off camera]
That's a good boy, sonny. Don't fight!
Wow. Someone must have dropped acid in his Geritol.
And to think someday she's gonna be somebody's mother.
